Articles.Content:
I decided to make a single massive vehicle to make it to Duna (and hopefully back) with a drill and converter and whatever else might be necessary to work on stuff out there. 

I think I probably need some other parts as I'm not sure how the converter works (never used the drill stuff before), but for now, I have an automated drill/converter lander (no thrust, so you better be good at landing where you wanted to), a regular Kerbal lander, and the Apollo style CSM return vehicle. 

Oh, and 3 satellites that you will deploy along the way to map the planet and its moon (and...something else. You get 3).

![screenshot25.png](http://www.mmudforums.com/images/ksp/screenshot25.png)

![screenshot26.png](http://www.mmudforums.com/images/ksp/screenshot26.png)

Don't let KER fool you, there's way more DeltaV here than 5k.

In LKO:

![screenshot27.png](http://www.mmudforums.com/images/ksp/screenshot27.png)

[The craft file](http://www.mmudforums.com/images/ksp/Duna)

Feel free to give me any suggestions you might have.

EDIT: Ahh, damnit, I can't edit the title typo. It's exploitation. Not explotation. Though Explotating Duna sounds like the Kerbal thing to do.

That looks expensive. You are sandbox right?

Looks cool, pretty aesthetic. No Nervs though?
